# Locale Calendar Identifiers

**API Collection**

Predefined locale keys used to get calendar values—values for `kCFLocaleCalendarIdentifier`.

## Overview

Locale objects use key-value pairs to store property values. Use the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFLocaleGetValue(_:_:)] function to get the value of a specific property listed above.

## Constants

- **gregorianCalendar**: The name of the calendar currently supported by the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFDateFormatterKey/calendarName] property.
- **buddhistCalendar**: Specifies the Buddhist calendar.
- **chineseCalendar**: Specifies the Chinese calendar.
- **hebrewCalendar**: Specifies the Hebrew calendar.
- **islamicCalendar**: Specifies the Islamic calendar.
- **islamicCivilCalendar**: Specifies the Islamic tabular calendar with Friday (civil) origin.
- **islamicTabularCalendar**: Specifies the Islamic tabular calendar with Thursday (astronomical) origin.
- **islamicUmmAlQuraCalendar**: Specifies the Islamic Umm Al Qura calendar.
- **japaneseCalendar**: Specifies the Japanese calendar.
- **republicOfChinaCalendar**: Specifies the calendar for the Republic of China.
- **persianCalendar**: Specifies the Persian calendar.
- **indianCalendar**: Specifies the Indian calendar.
- **cfiso8601Calendar**: Specifies the ISO 8601 calendar.

## Constants

- **CFLocaleLanguageDirection**: These constants describe the text direction for a language. They are returned by the functions [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFLocaleGetLanguageCharacterDirection(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFLocaleGetLanguageLineDirection(_:)].
- **Locale Property Keys**: Predefined locale keys used to get property values.
- **Locale Change Notification**: Identifier for notification sent if the current locale changes.
